Not Found.title: Not Found
Not Found.message: The page or resource you have requested was not found on our server.

tooBusy.message: The server is temporary very busy and could not process your request. Please try again in a few moment.

Internal Server Error.title: Internal Server Error
Internal Server Error.message: Something went wrong on our server while processing your request. Kindly try again after a while or please let us know the details of your action.

csrf_token_error.title: The server could not validate your request. Please try again after a while or contact the support.
